level.heading: Enforcement mechanism against an agency.
level.text: If an agency fails to meet any of the goals set forth in ยง 2-218.41, the Department may require that a portion of the agency's contracts and procurements be made part of a set-aside program for small business enterprises.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 2352 of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-33
level.text: For Law 16-33, see notes following ยง 2-218.01.
